mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 1, body = #{body}, articleId = #{articleId}, memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT *, M.name AS extra__writer FROM reply AS AR INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON AR.memberId = M.id WHERE AR.articleId = #{articleId} AND AR.id >= #{from} AND AR.displayStatus = 1 AND AR.delStatus = 0 ORDER BY AR.id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0, delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
